sarkas.potentials.coulomb module¶

Module for handling Coulomb interaction

sarkas.potentials.coulomb.Coulomb_force_P3M(r, pot_matrix)[source]¶

Calculate Potential and Force between two particles when the P3M algorithm is chosen.

Parameters

  • r (real) – Distance between two particles.

  • pot_matrix (array) – It contains potential dependent variables.

Returns

  • U_s_r (float) – Potential value.

  • fr (float) – Force between two particles.

Update params class with Coulomb’s parameters.

Parameters

  • params (object) – Simulation’s parameters

  • read_input (bool) – Flag to read inputs from YAML input file.
